item.description:
Dog Walk- Penwood State Park Bloomfield - AnnMarie leading!


A beautiful loop through the woods on a dirt and gravel path that passes Lake Louise and many wonderful overlooks! There are many trails off this main route but I will be sticking to the dirt trail unless group census is different! I could not find a trail map but I think the loop is about 2.5 miles long. Not a difficult walk but very scenic and relaxing.
There are no poop bags provided so please bring your own and NO AGGRESSIVE DOGS!! You must have your dog under control at all times and take responsibility for your dogs actions!

Directions: I-91 N or S :Take exit 35B which is the Bloomfield Route 218 exit. Also Known as Cottage Grove Road. Follow Cottage Grove Road heading west until you reach route 185. Follow rt.185 heading for Simsbury. At the top of the hill, the entrance to Penwood
is on the left. Check with Map Quest for further directions.

Look for my greyhound and you know you've found me! #860-309-3933
